short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unofficial (but better) Chrome Extension for Yo. Based on original.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A (better) Chrome extension for using Yo in your browser. This is based on the original Yo Chrome extension, but has been vastly improved to be more stable and has support for Yo Location (@YO), Yo Links (like the original) and simple Yo.

Mostly just the UI I would say. Soon I'll release a version where you can receive Yo's in your browser. How cool is that?
